scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile-build-tools && npm run compile-client && npm run render && npm run copy-assets && npm run compile-styles && npm run css-minify
scripts.compile-styles: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 styles/styles.scss built/styles/styles.css
scripts.copy-assets: cross-env-shell shx mkdir -p built/assets/ && cross-env-shell shx cp -r assets/ built/ && cross-env-shell shx cp -r styles/ built/
scripts.watch: npm run build && concurrently "npm run serve" "npm run watch-styles" "npm run watch-build-tools" "npm run watch-client" "npm run watch-ejs" "npm run watch-view-data"
scripts.watch-styles: nodemon --watch styles/ --ext scss --exec "npm run compile-styles && npm run css-minify"
